tool_description: A provably fair RNG, it will handle everything required.
title: Provably Fair Random Number Generator

api_list.name: welcome
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://provably-fair-random-number-generator.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "provably-fair-random-number-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: revealAndResetServerSeed
getResult
api_list.description: Get a Provably fair result of multiple types | PercentileResult - returns Double - No optional params | AnyResult - returns Double - Required outOfX (maximum result) | CardDeck - returns List of cards - Required deckCount (amount of decks to generate and shuffle) | RandomShuffle - returns List - Required itemOptions | RandomSelector - return Object - Required itemOptions

api_list.name: viewWithBlockedSeed
makeFreshAccount

import requests

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
